subject: Re: [PATCH v4 24/31] mm: memcontrol: prepare for reparenting LRU pages for lruvec lock

reviews.author: Qi Zheng (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer pointed out a potential issue where LRU folios might be moved to the parent lruvec but their corresponding objcg not reparented, leading to lock contention.

reviews.author: Shakeel Butt
reviews.summary: Shakeel Butt reviewed the patch series and provided feedback on several patches, including suggestions to improve code organization, fix potential issues, and clarify comments.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: The reviewer raised a concern that the patch might break lockdep on more than 4 NUMA nodes due to acquiring two locks per node, exceeding MAX_LOCKDEP_SUBCLASSES.

reviews.author: Harry Yoo
reviews.summary: Reviewer Harry Yoo pointed out a type mismatch in the nr_pages parameter of mem_cgroup_update_lru_size() and requested it to be updated from int to long.
